Articles.Content: 3rd satellite repair job attempt now, got the repair kit for a small antenna but all antennas on the satellites have been working like a charm when I got there. Here's the thing:; Every time, I used the claw to grab the satellite to keep it from tumbing and getting away. I now noticed that when I grab the satellite, it changes its name to my vessel's name. Could that be the reason none of these satellite repair jobs have worked out, some kind of ID issue?
